doc:
Christopher Pizzey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Pizzey 0 Christopher Pizzey (born 23 December 1976) is an English actor and comedian, best known for playing Mr. Stephen on the Children's BBC series The Basil Brush Show. Christopher_Pizzey ( born_23_December_1976 ) is an_English_actor_and_comedian , best_known for playing Mr._Stephen on the_Children 's_BBC_series The_Basil_Brush_Show .
